    • Method Detail

      • create

        public void create()
        Creates the game. Initializes the sprite batch and asset manager. Also starts the game until we have a main menu.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Disposes of all assets.
        Specified by:
        dispose in interface com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener
        Overrides:
        dispose in class com.badlogic.gdx.Game

      • createMusicPlayer

        public void createMusicPlayer()
        Creates the music player responsible for playing the game soundtrack. Sets volume to half power, indicates that music should loop and plays it.

      • getAssetManager

        public com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetManager getAssetManager()
